hadiths.text: This hadith is narrated by Muhammad b. 'Amr b. Ata' with these words:I was with Ibn 'Abbas, and Ibn 'Abbas saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) doing like this, and it is also said that the words are: He (the Holy Prophet) offered prayer; and the word" people" is not mentioned

chapter.ara-name: باب نَسْخِ " الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا مَسَّتِ النَّارُ "
chapter.eng-name: Abrogation of wudu’ for that which has been touched by fire
